subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Going into Sunday’s Pep Boys 500 at Atlanta Motor Speedway, Clint Bowyer is third in the standings, 115 points behind the first-place Jeff Gordon with three more races remaining.
snippet: Going into Sunday’s Pep Boys 500 at Atlanta Motor Speedway, Clint Bowyer is third in the standings, 115 points behind the first-place Jeff Gordon with three more races remaining.
